name: Illumio
description: This app integrates with the Illumino to implement containment actions to block a port/protocol

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
List of traffic on specified port
actions.verbose: Alllowed values for 'policy_decisions' parameter are: allowed, unknown, potentially_blocked, and blocked. Valid date format allowed: MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss and YYYY/MM/DD hh:mm:ss. Supported timezone offset format for parameters 'start_time' and 'end_time' are Z(UTC), ±HH:MM, ±HHMM and ±HH.

start_time.description: Start time for traffic analysis (Valid date format allowed: MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss and YYYY/MM/DD hh:mm:ss)

end_time.description: End time for traffic analysis (Valid date format allowed: MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss and YYYY/MM/DD hh:mm:ss)

actions.description: Get ip list of specified name
